desc: Online Only! Shop the World's Best 2-Wick Scented Candles guaranteed. Amazing fragrances, essential oils, 100% soy and soy blended candles in various sizes.

layout.text: At NOLA QUEEN CANDLES we offer only the highest quality, 100% soy wax and soy blended candles in various sizes, as well as wax melts. We provide a full line of scents inspired by the spirit and fragrances of New Orleans – making your house in any state remind you of the city of New Orleans.
